issue.title: TF data from ignition does not follow REP 105

content.raw:
That url leads toa 404. I assume you mean jgrogers/subt\_hello\_world/commits, instead of osrf/subt/commits?

I’ve pulled that commit, and cartographer does appear to be working now with helloworld-ign.launch. However, I am attaching a new frames.pdf, because there still may be frame issues that could cause problems in other areas. E.g. map->X1->X1/base\_link->base\_link? And the disconnected X1/front\_camera\_optical->X1/X1/front\_camera\_optical

Thanks, Arthur!
content.html:
That url leads toa 404. I assume you mean jgrogers/subt_hello_world/commits, instead of osrf/subt/commits?

I’ve pulled that commit, and cartographer does appear to be working now with helloworld-ign.launch. However, I am attaching a new frames.pdf, because there still may be frame issues that could cause problems in other areas. E.g. map->X1->X1/base_link->base_link? And the disconnected X1/front_camera_optical->X1/X1/front_camera_optical

Thanks, Arthur!
